column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I've been here probably close to ten times. I've almost had everything on the menu and I've loved almost every single one of them.  If it has a food you like in it
column2: you will love the dish. If you like potatoes- any of them on the menu are fantastic. If you like bacon
column3: you will just die for the bacon wrapped dates. If you like Caesar salad
column4: theirs is phenomenal. The shorts ribs are amazing and hanging beef is well worth the price.  The mushrooms are delicious. And the sangria is perfect. So much yumminess.
